ComicInfo.Summary:
The spicy daily adventures of Angelina (a voluptuous angel) and Damiano (a mischievous devil) continue! Mirka Andolfo (Unnatural, DC Bombshells) brings to life a Heaven (and a Hell) filled with humor and lovable characters, as only she can, in Un/Sacred.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mirka Andolfo | 1 | B | Cover B | Linda Šejić | 3 | C | Cover C | Sabine Rich | 4 | D | Lingerie Cover D | Mirka Andolfo | 5 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Gold Variant Cover | Mirka Andolfo | 6 | RE | Comic Kingdom of Canada Exclusive Variant Cover | Carla Cohen | 2 |
